TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SerializationMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines the serialization method used for a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings.SerializeAs%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings> object controls the serialization mode for a single profile property setting.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings.SerializeAs%2A> property. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection> class.
[!code-cs[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#17](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.configurati_92_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#17](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.configurati_92_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.SerializationMode Binary = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The object is serialized using binary serialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.SerializationMode ProviderSpecific = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The provider has implicit knowledge of the type and is responsible for deciding how to serialize the object into the data store.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.SerializationMode String = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The object is serialized to a simple string.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.SerializationMode Xml = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The profile is serialized as XML using XML serialization.
